00322 {
00323    int i;
00324    int len = strlen(line);
00325 
00326    for (i = 0; i < len; i++) {
00327       if (line[i] != ESC)
00328          continue;
00329       if ((i < (len - 2)) &&
00330           (line[i + 1] == 0x5B)) {

00332          case 0x30:
00333          case 0x31:
00334          case 0x33:

00336          }
00337       }
00338       /* replace ESC with a space */
